subject: Indian Polity
topic: Panchayati Raj aur Nagariya Swashasan (73rd & 74th Amendment)
question_en: What is the significant role of Gram Panchayats under the 73rd Amendment?
question_hi: 73वें संविधान के अधिकारी रोल क्या है।
explanation_en: Under the 73rd and 74th Amendments, Gram Panchayats play a significant role in rural development. The primary focus of Gram Panchayats is to improve the socio-economic conditions of the rural areas and provide basic services to the people living there. They are responsible for implementing various schemes and programs related to rural development.
